overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Working Late" — Falcon joins the Bisexual Revolution when the boss gets it on with his secretary and the office boy. "Someday I'll Have You" — Young college jock masturbates in the workout room. "Gordon Grant" — The manly good looks of Gordon Grant become almost secondary to the sexual excitement generated by his enthusiastic handling of the business at hand. "Brian" — Brian is a big handsome young man who handles heavy equipment by day and some of his own heavy equipment by night.
title: Working Late
